description:
With the evil dragon now inhabiting Mist`s body, the second wave of the uprising approaches Mardat. Laust and his companions fight to defend the city, but when they find themselves overwhelmed by the dragon`s powers, Narsena decides to sacrifice herself.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Ce dénouement est le début d`un nouveau voyage, en réalité
Regarding the Conclusion, Which Was, in Fact, the Start of a New Journey
Sono Ketsumatsu, Jitsu wa Arata na Tabi no Hajimari ni Tsuki
その結末, 実は新たな旅のはじまりにつき
